original_text: As they went into Jerusalem, they made music with harps, lyres and trumpets. They went to the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 그들이 비파와 수금과 나팔을 합주하고 예루살렘에 이르러 여호와의 전에 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: they made music with harps, lyres and trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 수금, 비파와 나팔로 음악을 연주했다

sentences.original_text: They went to the Lord's temple
